name: Trigger
short_description: The first tool that offers you the possibility to be notified with any indicator, yes you got it right ANY!

params.title: Trigger x.x.x.
params.content: The name, version, and link to find references for this tool

params.title: Check logic every
params.content: You can choose whether to check for notifications every tick or when a new bar opens.

params.title: Reset after these bars
params.content: After notification, the trigger for that logic is reset after this number of bars

params.title: Enabled?
params.content: You can disable the logic without resetting the parameters

params.title: Is
params.content: You can choose which logic to adopt for comparison

params.title: 'C' Or this level (greater than zero bypass 'B' )
params.content: Used to define a level, such as for oscillators but also for prices, if the value is greater than zero the reference 'B' will be ignored

params.title: With this message (empty = standard message)
params.content: If left empty it will send a standard message, otherwise you can customize it

params.title: Enabled?
params.content: You can choose whether to display a popup on the local computer

params.title: Enabled ?
params.content: Enable notifications to a webhook, next parameters must be changed
